ch.supertomcat.bh.database

Class DB

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.supertomcat.bh.database.DB

  • public abstract class DB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the connections to the databases As database db4o is used, which makes it easy to store the Pic- and Keyword-Objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DB_DOWNLOADS
      Index of the downloads-db
      static int DB_KEYWORDS
      Index of the keywords-db

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addObject(java.lang.Object object, int iDB)
      Adds an object to the database For updates of objects you should also use this method, because update and add is exactly the same
      static void addObjects(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects, int iDB)
      Adds multiple object to the database For updates of objects you should also use this method, because update and add is exactly the same
      static void asyncCommit(int iDB)
      This method commits the database, but uses an own thread for this so that the calling thread is not blocked.
      static void closeDatabase(int iDB)
      Close the database (without commit!)
      static void commit(int iDB)
      Write data to the database-file
      static void deleteObject(java.lang.Object object, int iDB)
      Deletes an object from the database
      static void deleteObjects(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects, int iDB)
      Deletes multiple objects from the database
      static java.lang.String getDatabasePath(int iDB)
      Returns the path to the database
      static com.db4o.ObjectSet getObjects(java.lang.Class cl, int iDB)
      Reads out object from the database which are instances of the given class
      static void openDatabase(int iDB)
      Open a database

        iDB - Index of the database
        Returns:

      • commit

        public static void commit(int iDB)
        Write data to the database-file
        Parameters:
        iDB - Index of database

      • asyncCommit

        public static void asyncCommit(int iDB)
        This method commits the database, but uses an own thread for this so that the calling thread is not blocked. So this method is useful when a commit is needed from a GUI thread, but it is not required to wait for completion of the commit.
        Parameters:
        iDB - Index of database
